The Six Keys to Efficient Communication in Remote Teams Be Clear - with what answer or outcome you expect Be Succinct - try to summarise everything in as fewer sentences as possible 1/ #remoteteams #remotework #futureofwork #allremote

Be Straightforward - don’t lie or twist what you are saying. Simply outline what you need and why Be Focused - make sure that the main point you are making stands out and that the other person will understand that Any more? 3/ #remoteteams #remotework #futureofwork

Be Direct - don’t ask if somebody would like to do something, tell them what needs doing for speed Be Decisive - try to choose one path to make sure your idea is executed 2/ #remoteteams #remotework #futureofwork #allremote
